product_name: Lowa Frankie GTX Mid Hiking Boots - Kids'
long_description: Young feet will enjoy comfort and stability while on the trail with the Lowa Frankie GTX Mid Hiking boots. Suede leather and Cordura(R) nylon uppers stand up to wear and tear. GORE-TEX(R) waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Nylon linings wick moisture away from feet, keeping them dry. Light yet durable polyurethane midsoles absorb shock for all-day comfort; nylon shanks provide lightweight support. Durable rubber outsoles on the Lowa Frankie GTX Mid hiking boots provide reliable traction.
short_description: Young feet will enjoy comfort and stability while on the trail with the Lowa Frankie GTX Mid Hiking boots.
